pageTitle: HTC One Appears On SingTelShop; Price Plans Revealed (Update) - HardwareZone.com.sg
textBeforeTable: Here's the full breakdown of SingTel's pricing plans for the HTC One: The HTC One briefly appeared on SingTel's online store, with details revealing full pricing plans and promotions, before being taken down ahead of its launch tomorrow (13th April). However we were able to capture screenshots of all the details. *Update at 6.23 pm: A SingTel spokesperson just informed us that the HTC One is available for walk-in customers at SingTel shops today. The phone will also be available for purchase online from tomorrow. The purchase comes with a free premium pack which includes a charger, screen protector and casing.  There will be a free HTC Mini for Flexi Value plans and above. textAfterTable: If you're thinking about purchasing the HTC One, make sure you check out our full review as well as our video comparison between the HTC One, the Samsung Galaxy S4 and Sony Xperia Z.
